lead_paragraph: The MKX crossover is a good move in the revival of Lincoln, a handsome, spacious crossover that should help the brand re-establish itself.

headline.print_headline: The 2016 MKX  Aims Lincoln  in the Right Direction
headline.main: Video Review: The 2016 MKX Aims Lincoln in the Right Direction

snippet: The MKX crossover is a good move in the revival of Lincoln, a handsome, spacious crossover that should help the brand re-establish itself.
abstract: Driven column revieww of 2016 MKX Lincoln.
